title: Factoring a Quadratic Equation
text: To factor a quadratic expression $${ax}^2-c=0$$, the first step is to divide both sides by a.
speech: To factor a quadratic expression , a x squared, minus c, is equal to 0 , the first step is to divide both sides by a.

, the first step is to divide both sides by a.

title: Dividing Both Sides of the Equation
text: After dividing both sides by a, what does the equation turn into?
speech: After dividing both sides by a, what does the equation turn into?

title: Difference of Squares
text: The expression then turns into a difference of squares, $$x^2-d^2$$, that can be factored as $$\left(x+d\right) \left(x-d\right)$$.
speech: The expression then turns into a difference of squares,  x squared minus d squared , that can be factored as  parentheses x plus d,  times, parentheses x minus d,  .

, that can be factored as    x plus d,  times,  x minus d,

title: Answers of a Quadratic Equation
text: The answers of a quadratic equation are its roots, the $$x$$ values that make the expression $$0$$.
